headline: Is It Too Late To Consider GE Vernova (GEV) After A 51% One-Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether GE Vernova's share price still reflects good value after its recent run, this article will help you put the current valuation into context. The stock closed at US$661.67, with a 3% return over the last 7 days, flat performance over 30 days, a 2.6% decline year to date, and a 51.5% return over the past year. Recent coverage around GE Vernova has focused on its position as a pure play in the energy and power equipment space and how investors are weighing that focus...
